segments.text: My gaze has shifted now to the children near the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy teetering precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet, clearly aiming for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of fear seeing how unstable that stool looks beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s tilted and its legs are splayed out, almost ready to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing below, arm outstretched, ready to receive a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems utterly delighted at the prospect of a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm truly surprised at their boldness, considering the adult is just feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re so focused on their sweet heist, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll manage to get away with their sugary loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The anticipation on the girl's face is quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a daring little operation they’ve got going on there.
segments.speaker: PAR
